text: 2|114|aur usase bada atyaachaaree kaun hoga, jo allaah kee masjidon mein usake naam ka varnan karane se roke aur unhen ujaadane ka prayatn kare?[1] unheen ke lie yogy hai ki usamen darate hue pravesh karen, unheen ke lie sansaar mein apamaan hai aur unheen ke lie aakhirat (paralok) mein ghor yaatana hai.
